In my opinion that is not enough. It is now the 21st of December and my order has just now been delivered - almost a month later.The case is alright, but is not worth the price and the trouble.

The product might be ok but communication not so clever.Thank you for the reply,It’s odd that several polite emails were unable to get a response and still have not heard back from the last, but if I take time to write a review of my experience you are on it straight away Regards Terry

Review.Titre: Ordered two cases on november 6th, didn’t ship until december 12th
Review.Contenu: Ordered two cases on november 6th. Almost a month later, they had still not been produced (in the order tracking section it said ‘pending for production’), so I wrote to customer service. They replied quickly, saying that they were quite busy, but they would produce and ship my order within the next week. They then offered me premium shipping for free, which I gladly accepted.Another week later, I checked on my order again because I still hadn’t gotten an email saying that it had been shipped, and what do you know, it still said ‘pending for production’. I was angry. I had ordered one of the cases for myself, but the second one was a christmas gift, and at this point we were barely two weeks before christmas, and, knowing how long shipping can take, especially with casetify (since I had ordered from them twice before), I was starting to get really worried the case wouldn’t arrive in time for christmas. So I wrote to customer service again, and I got a reply the day after stating that one of the cases I ordered was out of stock, so like whoopsies nothing they can do.I was furious. Why tell me that you’re going to ship my order within a week, no problem, and then a week later all of a sudden you’re out of stock? Didn’t make any sense to me.Told them they were either lying to me or just sucked at communicating and to cancel the case that was ‘out of stock’ and just send me the other one. In the reply I got they just said ok, that case is cancelled, bye bye.I’m still angry, probably never ordering from them again.Only reason I’m not giving them one star is because the customer service was fast and I got premium shipping.Very very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Casetify Charges You Whether They Know They Can Ship Your Product or Not
Review.Contenu: I placed order 18709443 three weeks ago.  After almost two weeks—the end of my estimated delivery window— I emailed them because the items still hadn’t shipped. “Kali” emailed me back to say one of the items was out of stock (in spite of still showing in stock on the website) and asked if I wanted to choose a replacement. I responded back within a few hours saying I did, gave the name of the new color I wanted, and asked if the price difference could be refunded. It has been six days since my response and nothing has happened. I have replied to the email daily asking for updates and still nothing. My order still shows as “on hold.” I tried to reach out via the website due to their non response via email. No reply there either. Finally, I tried to connect with them via instagram DM and the two replies I have gotten are both “kindly wait for our teammate to assist you via email to avoid any miscommunication.” Hard to have miscommunication when no one is communicating at all. It feels like a massive scam to have a company charge your card for products before they ship, hold that money for weeks, and fail to address your issue after repeated attempts to contact them. I thought ordering a month before Christmas would be adequate but apparently not. At this rate if the issue is not resolved ASAP I’ll pursue a chargeback with my bank. Update: within an hour of leaving this review, Kali reached out again to say that my emails had been “screened out” and she hadn’t received them. Not sure that feels truthful but whatever at this point. She indicated she updated my order with the new item I had selected and the order shows as in progress again. I leave my review at two stars as there is very little chance it will get here before Christmas in spite of having placed an order for two in stock items nearly a month prior. Casetify never reached out to me to tell me there was an issue—I had to waste two weeks waiting for it to ship, contact them myself, and only then found out. Then another week with no response about fixing the situation. They likewise did not offer to expedite or upgrade shipping due to their error. And in all of this, the item they said held up my order STILL shows in stock in their website. What a disappointment, bordering on what feels like unethical behavior.

Review.Pseudo: Guy fed up with the website
Review.Contenu: The lack of communication is frustrating yet you will send a ton of emails trying to promote your company. Don’t inform the customer at all during the whole process. Customer has to log in online to check the status of their order. Can’t stay signed in online either. Have to log in every time you go to the website. This is very aggravating. Then order says it’s shipped and gives a tracking number. Yet you check the tracking number day after day and for days it will just say the label has been created but the carrier has not received the package yet. Don’t say you shipped the item until you actually ship. That’s false advertisement. It already takes your company weeks to ship. Then an additional week order 2 to actually physically ship the item. Your company just needs to do better. 3rd time I’ve ordered from this company and the 3rd time I’ve had problems with them. My girlfriend even placed an order once and returned the case due to it not working properly and taking nearly a month to get here.
The ordering process was cumbersome. Forced me to login and I could t remember my password. Very frustrating. My daughter wants this or I would have quit and ordered somewhere easier.

Review.Titre: Be weary of the size of your camera hole
Review.Contenu: I ordered 2 phone cases. 1 for an iPhone 14 pro max. And I love everything about it. The other was for my sons phone. An iPhone 13. The camera hole doesn’t fit like it should. It is too small. And customer service told me that the case isn’t compatible with a camera protector. Seriously?!? His old case, an OtterBox, fits it just fine. But the one from Casetify will not fit it. And no other solution given by Casetify. They did send another case exactly the same to try and make it right. But that’s it. I offered to send the 2 cases that didn’t fit back so maybe I could receive one that actually fit. And no response to that. So I am truly disappointed with this company at this point.
I bought the case, it hasn't even been a month yet and it's already yellow… I am unsatisfied with the quality and for the price I paid, this should have better quality.

Review.Titre: I have visited the newly open casetify…
Review.Contenu: I have visited the newly open casetify studio in Singapore (Somerset 313). And ordered 2 phone custom phone casing. At first everything was okay until to the point that the team got my orders wrong. I’ve waited for 2 hours for them to rectify the problem to also know that I was overcharged by matching my receipt and my credit card charged receipt. I ended up purchasing more during that day. The staff is polite and helpful in trying to expedite my order and even suggested to revisit the next day for collection. But I didn’t want to so I waited. I mean I don’t blame them for the screw up. I am okay but specifically one girl staff I don’t really like. She is rude, shows no respect to customer and even her colleagues. My friend also visited your store the very next day to place an order on my behalf and was served by her, she brushed off my friend and just tell him off that the design he requested is not available and there is no more stock for the item. In a very rude manner “THIS ONE DONT HAVE, THAT ONE ALSO DONT HAVE”, and just walk away. She’s the lady with a very big glasses and ducked face. I feel that even though it’s very busy at the store and there’s many customers to serve, basic customer service has to apply, talk nicely by all means. By talking nicely with rejection is still acceptable. I do not know why you guys hire such person with such bad attitude and rude customer service. Or maybe she doesn’t like the job. I’m a fan for casetify and I purchased many from Thailand without a membership registration, even though is very busy in Thailand but the politeness is there. Not saying your team is bad in SG. But that girl is rudddeeee to the max. I will not forget her and I won’t want to be served by her ever again. Thank you for your time

And I would like to add that Font should be resized. Because if you put in just 1-2 letters, it will be very big. Some people like it small. and can be placed in any position I understand adding these things to the system is not easy. But I hope to gradually improve and perfect it in the future. Thank you. I've had a couple of Casetify covers, and they've all been great. But particularly one of the ultra-impact cases, I used it continuously without changing for a year. With all its mishaps, it survived for 1 and a half years. I just received my new case. And I intend to use this one for as long or more! It's worth the investment.

It’s a bit annoying with how pricey the cases are. The wish is that some of the designs came in different colors. Like the new cheetah design is all pink and it would be nice to have other options. I love my case, and it has saved my phone quite a few times.

Finally settled on a customized Bounce Case; clear. I would have liked a few more font & color choices, which is the only thing keeping you all from getting a solid 5 stars; if I could give you 4.5/5, I would have; overall I am pleased. I am confident I’ve just purchased to best protection for my 15 Pro Max.  That said - just want to mention that my timing for being turned on to your brand, via Flossy Carter, is uncanny -  as I placed this order, knowing that Casetify is responsible for theft of IP/teardown design by a well established YouTuber.  I hope Mgt will take this issue by the horns & absolutely own their f*ckup.  Owning one’s f*ckup is becoming more and more rare.  So by getting ahead of this storm, owning it, apologizing & paying whoever needs to be paid, and moving forward is exactly what I hope you all do….I want to be a loyal customer for years to come….Ron MobbsHouston, TX
